name: Rocket Jumper and the Time Crack
name_original: Rocket Jumper and the Time Crack
description:
In the year 3600, the world population is severely addicted to a chemical known as 'Time Crack'. This wonderful drug heals the body, steels the mind and staves off aging!

But we've run out, and there's only one place to get more – the past!

You play as Rocket Jumper, who journeys to Ancient Asia to collect more Time Crack. Using your trusty rocket launcher, you must navigate the peculiar and mystical lands of times past...

CONTROLS

WASD to Move

Spacebar to Jump

Mouse to Aim

Left-Click to Shoot

Pick up Time Crack to replenish health

Do sick rocket jumps to gain altitude and speed

ESCAPE to close game

CREDITS

Programming and Concept by Gustav Schrøder

Level Design and Concept by Magnus Frank

Level Design and VFX by Nanna Pedersen

GAME JAM

This game was made in 2 days for Reload Magazine x In The Keep Mini Game Jam #1

The Theme was: Health Mechanics! For this game, we decided to try and create a rocket jump which the player could use to platform around – but at the cost of their health points. In order to stay alive and keep going, the player needs to collect Time Crack to replenish their health. This is also the goal of the game, turning it into a collect-o'-thon / FPS platformer.

THE FOLLOWING PRE-MADE ASSETS WERE USED IN UNREAL ENGINE 5:

  • Unreal Starter Content
  • Lowpoly Style Asia Environment
  • Low Poly Medieval Interior and Props
  • Royalty free images from Canva.com
  • Generic Rifle Cock by GameWithBepis
  • Dark Cave Drone by Kinoton
  • Dark Cave Background 2 by SolarPhasing
  • Samurai ☯ Asian Japanese Music Lofi Hip Hop Mix
  • Garden Background by Fabrizio84
  • Sad Horror Music by TheoTer
  • Warrior Death Cry - British Male by theuncertainman
  • Asian Harmony by N0IZ
  • Sniffing, Short by InspectorJ
  • Human Sounds Sniff Sniffing by deleted_user_7146007
  • male pain sound effects by rockittt

For an optimal experience, play with sound.
